page.title: 03Housing
page.content: A review of 9 estate agents showed house prices to be:- Detached Â£36,000, Semi Â£25,000,Terraced Â£15,000, Flats Â£20,000.Most popular is the semi-detached.Terraced houses sell fastest.Rural properties rather slower to sell.Estate Agents fees around 1.5% of purchase prices. Average number months on market:Detached 9,Semi 4.5, Terraced 3, Flat 3.Number of houses on market increased since 1973. 1970's houses on Northolme Estate mainly 3-bedroomed semi detached. Around 2 children per house. All houses have some form of insulation, wall cavity, loft or double glazing. Brackenborough Road 1950's houses smaller than Northolme Estate.Houses worse condition.Very early 1920's council houses on Jubilee Crescent have 2 bedrooms,no garages.Narrow roads,difficult parking,no shops.
